original_text: And I will bring you out of the midst of it, and give you into the hands of foreigners, and execute judgments upon you.
korean_text: 너희를 그 성읍 가운데에서 끌어내어 타국인의 손에 넘겨 너희에게 벌을 내리리니

sentences.original_text: And I will bring you out of the midst of it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 너희를 그 중간에서 이끌어내리라

sentences.original_text: and give you into the hands of foreigners
